title: With rage blade's loss of AP portion what is going to happen to kayle?
body:
I'm not a kayle player I play her just once in a long while but I'm wondering if there are any plans for her, it's a staple item on her and well it's a champion that's still in the game isn't it?

Any recommendations for possible builds to test now guys, I wanted to start playing her more yesterday but now I'm kind of not sure if it's worth it unless there is a solid option #2.

Thanks.

replies.body: Why should we care ? She isn't {{champion:96}} or {{champion:110}}

I guess you can take it that way too xD.

Don't kog as well as var both have a decent second build with crit and as or lethlality or something like that from the past?

That's the issue I'm talking about (sarcastically obviously). They nerfed this item because those 2 abused it, but they can just go back to a normal crit / as build, and Varus can even be AD Xerath, while champs like Kayle can just be thrown in the dumpster
